Crystal nightly repositories

Apt

Add the repo:

apt-key adv --keyserver keys.gnupg.net --recv-keys 09617FD37CC06B54
echo "deb https://nightly.crystal-lang.org/apt crystal main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/crystal-nightly.list
apt-get update

Install:

apt-get install crystal-nightly

RPM

Add the repo:

cat > /etc/yum.repos.d/crystal-nightly.repo <<END
[crystal]
name = Crystal
baseurl = https://nightly.crystal-lang.org/rpm/
gpgcheck=0
END

Install:

dnf install crystal-nightly # On recent Fedora
yum install crystal-nightly # On older systems
